website_summaries.verdict: Has much to offer for the low price, including lots of space, rugged materials, easy setup. We recommend it if you need spacious beach shade on a budget.
pros: Surprisingly low price for the space
Easy to set up with two wide openings for ample airflow
Holds up in windy conditions better than most models in its class
cons: Not as easy to take down as it is to set up
The downside of the large openings is limited privacy

customer_reviews.title: Nice product. Used this several times and it worked ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice product.Used this several times and it worked great.The quality of this tent is really good.Pops up instantly. Good for this price.Better than expected!I read a lot of reviews before I bought it. Some people said it was hard to fold up.After received i read the instructions carefully and found it wasn't hard if you tried.So I uploaded a video to show you how to fold it up. No other meaning, just hope to help other buyers.
customer_reviews.author: dianashen520

customer_reviews.title: Never had such a luxury of privacy ..,, on beach before
customer_reviews.text: Oh my gosh Never had experience of such a luxury of privacy , protection from sun burn , ability spend HOURS COMFORTABLE on beach before . Tent Is NOT huge how some people claimed here . Tent is big enough to feel comfortable ( taking nap for example ) two adults + one child . My husband is tall 6.2 and he fits perfectly . With this tent FINALLY we can spend ALL day on beach , enjoy fresh ocean air . We kept both door down and inside tent wasn't hot at all . We got spoiled quick , never again go on beach without this tent
customer_reviews.author: marina hull

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for the beach
customer_reviews.text: Great easy set up and tear down! That was the most Important aspect I was looking for when shopping. I have a 2 and 3yr old so being able to set up and pack up quickly is a necessity. I like how it opens in the front and back allowing the wknd to pass through creating a nice breeze. Roomy enough for 4 people comfortably and a pack-n-play if you needed. I highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and useful
customer_reviews.text: Convenient and useful. However, I don't recommend using this on a windy day. I recently tried to use this on a windy day (15+mph) and the tent wanted to fly away. The stakes that come with it are just not long enough to effectively keep it to the ground on a windy day. The frame would benefit from another flexible rod, but that could hinder the ease of breakdown and collapsibility. So I understand why it was designed as is. Sans wind, this is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: David K. Masuda

customer_reviews.title: Could easily fit two reg lounge chairs inside and still have ...
customer_reviews.text: Popped right open in my living room and after reading the instructions realized how to get it untangled. Will be using it at the beach today. Could easily fit two reg lounge chairs inside and still have room. Seems pretty sturdy. Filled the instructions to put back in the bag and wasn't hard. Hopefully it holds up at the beach. If it doesn't I will update this post.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Loved it,  big enough for 3 adults
customer_reviews.text: Love it, we used it for a vacation and it was just what we needed. It is a little confusing on closing it because you feel like you are going to break it. Once you get the hang of that, it's easy and fast.
customer_reviews.author: Marisa D

customer_reviews.title: One of the pegs keeps popping out so it makes ...
customer_reviews.text: One of the pegs keeps popping out so it makes folding up really difficult. Once it's up it works really well and we use it all the time. Update- the seller messaged me directly and was able to help me get a tent that was not defective! Great customer service and will use them again in the future due to their enthusiasm to make every customer happy.
customer_reviews.author: megan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This pop up tent is awesome. It has plenty of room for 2 people as well as 4 seeking shade. It pops up as soon as you unhinged the strap. This tent is everything!!! When it’s time to put away, just connect the poles as indicated, fold like a figure 8 and pack in the carrying case! I was able to do this by myself and so you can you!
customer_reviews.author: Bri

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up, enormous inside
customer_reviews.text: Wow, it’s HUGE! It unfolded and propped open very easily. I set it up in my kitchen to make sure I liked it and wanted to keep it. My son and I sat inside with plenty of room to spare. The little cargo pockets are helpful, and the photo instructions on the carrying case were IMPERATIVE to closing it up - I never would have figured it out otherwise, but once I did it was simple.
customer_reviews.author: MyBunnyGoBoom

customer_reviews.title: The Beach Tent to Buy
customer_reviews.text: I love this beach tent. You do need to watch the You Tube videos they are the most helpful. You can throw it out of the bag to open, but there is still some adjusting to do. My husband fell asleep in it at the beach, he is 5'9", it does sway in the wind, but we only put in the stakes in the sand next to the tent, we did not use the ties for the stakes. This would be perfect if you need to cover up young children probably 6 could fit in the tent itself. I love that it is airy and have pockets.
customer_reviews.author: Cee2u

customer_reviews.title: I love this tent
customer_reviews.text: I love this tent! Love how it opens on both sides to that you can get the breeze on the beach. I don't use the posts to hold it down and use the sand bags to weigh it down! It came in very handy because my mom can't be in the sun for long periods of the time. Very easy to use, kind of awkward putting it away but it's still pretty easy.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: This tent is a nice quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: This tent is a nice quality for the price. It opens quite easily and sets up well, even on a windy beach day (extra sand is required in the weight bags though). When done using, it can be a tad tricky to fold away and requires some attention to using a "twist and fold" method. It has a nice carry bag and is lightweight. It is roomy inside and attractive, as well.
customer_reviews.author: colleen b

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This is easy to take down once you figure it out. The instructions could be a little more clear. We managed it the first time, on the beach, between 2 people under 10minutes with a storm approaching. It is super lightweight and much easier to pack than our huge canopy was. Will never drag that canopy to the beach again. I had an issue with the item arriving when expected with my prime membership, so I deducted one star. I would definitely reccommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Stancliff

customer_reviews.title: Cool cabana cute easy set up light weight
customer_reviews.text: Cool and cute. Easy to put up but confusing to fold up and Put in the bag again. Took a minute but We figured it out tho. I love it. It’s so cute. Light weight and overall It’s easy to set up. There are instructions permanently attached to the inside of the bag. Very convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Tia

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: After buying beach tents that only last one season, this has lasted a few years and is still going strong. We use it all the time in the backyard when we’re not at the beach, so it gets plenty of use with no real signs of wear.
customer_reviews.author: Colin P.

customer_reviews.title: Broke after first use
customer_reviews.text: We really liked using this tent, but one of the poles broke and made it not as good to use anymore. I don't know if it was normal usage, excess wind, or what, that did it, but I was a little bit disappointed in the quality of the poles. Since we bought it in October and didn't use it until December, our return window was closed. I'll be contacting the seller for a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Brian B.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice tent!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tent because I was taking my 3 month old on the beach and his pediatrician told us to limit his sun exposure. I must say that this tent kept him cool the whole day. I would’ve given the tent 5 stars if it didn’t bend so easily in windy conditions. We used the stakes, sandbags and then ropes (which were included) to anchor the tent onto a nearby tree and rock. We also had to place a few rocks inside the tent to stop the wind from blowing under the floor. Otherwise I am really pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, very roomy!
customer_reviews.text: We love this beach tent! Pops open easily and easy to fold up and close. Great quality and very roomy. We used this on a windy beach day and with the built in vents, the tent stayed in place. We didn't need to use the extra sand bags that were included, the pocket sandbags built into the tent was more than sufficient! Love it, love it, love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Louise Santos

customer_reviews.title: Great value. Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: I loved this pop up tent. It was perfect for our beach trip. But can be taken anywhere. Easy to pop up and put away. This product is amazing. I love when I buy something and get more than I expected. I would highly recommend this outdoor tent to anyone. Plenty of room inside and I love that you can vent from both sides.
customer_reviews.author: Gwen C

customer_reviews.title: I really like this tent
customer_reviews.text: I really like this tent! It popped up just like it said it would! It was windy, and the tent bent a bit with the wind, but it didn't harm my enjoyment. Provided great shade, but still let the breeze in. It isn't big enough for 4 people like it claims though. It was just enough for my boyfriend and I. We actually wish it were just a bit bigger. All in all, we really really like it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great item, just set up/break down before 1st real use
customer_reviews.text: While it was very easy to set up, more could have been done to better explain the folding up procedure. Other than that, I was very happy. It has closable vents on all sides and even pockets to keep items off the ground.
customer_reviews.author: mcyr75

customer_reviews.title: Smells terrible
customer_reviews.text: Easy to open, easy to close, and seems like it will work great. It smells absolutely awful when you first open it, though. Plan on setting up outside and letting air out for a few hours.
customer_reviews.author: That Guy

customer_reviews.title: is great! Pops up instantly
customer_reviews.text: The tent, itself, is great! Pops up instantly. The problem comes with folding it up and putting it back in the carry-all. There were no directions with it. I emailed the seller, who gave me a link to YouTube that would give me folding instructions. Unfortunately, the link was not for this particular model and could not find this model on YouTube. I struggle with it each time I have to fold it up, and that is disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Violet

customer_reviews.title: Perfect beach day tent
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this beach tent! Perfect for quick trips to the beach. Convenient to travel with and the perfect size for 1 or 3! Best purchase yet
customer_reviews.author: teethgirl

customer_reviews.title: Did its part
customer_reviews.text: Did its job ! Used it on the beach . Tough as he** to put up . I definitely just folded it up however I felt like it when we left lol. Family of six fit in it fine ages 30 to 6 months . A little tight but everyone was under 5'10
customer_reviews.author: Damari Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Great cabana but not for windy days
customer_reviews.text: Easy to deploy, though not so great for use in a beach that is windy. Now folding it is another story, LOL. Make sure to watch the video on how to fold it, it is very helpful. Otherwise good luck!
customer_reviews.author: Bangus

customer_reviews.title: ☺ We are  extremely satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: ⭐Easy to open as described. The people at G4Free customer service are gracious & helpful with any concerns we had. ☺ We are extremely satisfied. 👍 Outstanding customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not to me that the price is awesome. At the beach my son will spend most ...
customer_reviews.text: This tent is huge! I didn't get to use it at the beach yet. However, when we put it up in the house the kids immediately got in it and didn't want to take it down. I can't wait to go to the beach. I've had sun tents before that I bought from BJ's & Costcos and this one is the biggest so far. Not to me that the price is awesome. At the beach my son will spend most of his time in this tent as he get easily sunburned.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy
customer_reviews.text: Tent is so easy to put up. I have a 5 month old and she does very well in here. The set up and take down is less than 5 minutes which is necessary when you have a LO. Also the tent fits back into the bag that it came with which is not always the case with most tents.
customer_reviews.author: vivian rock

customer_reviews.title: 5 star tent
customer_reviews.text: Only used it once this summer but I would say, this tent would be used in the coming summers! It's sturdy and really protect from the sun. I loved that we didn't have to dig and put our stuff around the pole just to hold up the umbrella. It's very easy to unfold and fold back-in. We practiced at home before taking it to the beach.
customer_reviews.author: Jonnah B. Salcedo

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, quick assembly
customer_reviews.text: This tent was great. Took to the beach last month. Set up takes about a minute. Set it next to our canopy tent for grandchildren to play and nap in. Worked perfectly. Easy assembly and storage. Easy to clean. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Dickerson

customer_reviews.title: Love Cabana
customer_reviews.text: Huge tent/cabana. Bigger than we thought. We take it to the beach and just love it! Arrived on time. Material sturdy. Would purchase from seller and order again!
customer_reviews.author: Mysterious outlook

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for sunshade, but not on a windy day. Any wind at all, and the whole things flops about.
customer_reviews.author: Liv

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: I loved having this for summer. I used it on the beach and at the pool. It's a great size.
customer_reviews.author: Whit

customer_reviews.title: Great size and quality tent for the beach.
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves this tent for our newborn. We spend a lot of time at the beach and this provides wonderful shade and plenty of ventilation. It is surprisingly bigger than she is expected. Folds up nice and easy as well to put away in the included bag.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Richards

customer_reviews.title: Easy set-up easy takedown
customer_reviews.text: I just received my pop up tent, and is very curious as to how easy it was to set up and take down. So I opened it up unsnap the bottoms threw it and it popped open pretty decently, had to straighten it out a little bit. The bigger question was how easy is it to put back in the bag so I followed the instructions and it was as easy as the instructions say it is.
customer_reviews.author: K.B.

customer_reviews.title: Pain
customer_reviews.text: Flimsy Hard af to fold up Stakes need to be longer
customer_reviews.author: Batman

customer_reviews.title: If it’s windy leave it at home.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up , seems like good construction, lite weight , we didn’t get to use this until after the return window had closed and was disappointed with the way it held up up against normal beach wind.
customer_reviews.author: Beth watson.

customer_reviews.title: Salt life mom approved!
customer_reviews.text: This tent is very easy to set up and put away once you get a hang of it. We are a salt life family and enjoy spending time on the beach. I reccomend this tent to anyone. There are so many ways to stabilize this tent. So on windy days it doesnt become a parachute. I got the teal colored one and would have perferred the dark blue one for more shade on sunny days. Also im sure you can use this tent around other places as well. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Nini

customer_reviews.title: Great, affordable tent!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tent! It was super easy to put up. Taking down was difficult at first. Once I figured out the folding technique it was just as easy to take down. Definitely try at home to familiarize yourself with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: I used this tent for 2 different beach trips...about 5 days in all. It worked perfectly for 4 of those days. One day it was very windy and it did not work as well that day. All in all I’m so glad I chose this one as it worked wonderfully for the price point.
customer_reviews.author: Sara J Hagen

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy this garbage
customer_reviews.text: If it is even a little windy(which beaches always are) this tent is terrible. Its cheap.i was so angry i didnt even return it i almost set it on fire.
customer_reviews.author: kay

customer_reviews.title: Time consuming to set up and take down.
customer_reviews.text: Product was not easy to put away. Took way too much time. Total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Brent Kendall

customer_reviews.title: light weight andvery easy to carry
customer_reviews.text: This was our best beach buy ! We Just some sun shade at the beach. * light weight andvery easy to carry * very easy to set up and take down * very sturdy and light weight when you lift the whole tent to shake off the sand, easily cleaned. My family like it very much!
customer_reviews.author: Vincy

customer_reviews.title: TERRIBLE QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: ATTEMPTED TO USE AT THE BEACH BUT WHEN I PULLED OUT IT POPPED OPEN AND SNAPPED SOMETHING , GUESS THE RODS , NO POP UP. WASTE OF MONEY MATERIAL RIPPED. TOO MUCH PRESSURE OR SOMETHING.
customer_reviews.author: Clara Q.

customer_reviews.title: nice tent
customer_reviews.text: its definitely a nice tent. I don't regret buying it. It doesn't stay up well when its windy though and the bottom part is pretty useless too because it never stays in place even with the slightest wind. Its tricky to fold but actually once you figure it out its very very easy. love the extra pockets on the inside they are very useful.
customer_reviews.author: Miraleen Patel

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and take down.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to set up and use on the beach. Stayed in place using the sand bags on each corner. Provided the shade we needed.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Large tent perfect for kids
customer_reviews.text: This tent was really easy to put up and take down. It is great for kids. Some beaches like Myrtle beach do not allow you to use tents. You should probably check with where you are going. It has a lot of space and protects from the sun.
customer_reviews.author: Alesha Wajid-ali

customer_reviews.title: Best Beach Tent
customer_reviews.text: Love this tent as it affords uv protection. It's compact and easy to setup
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Best beach cover ever
customer_reviews.text: Easy peasy took 2 min to get this up. Baby stayed cool and it was quick to take down . Lots of fresh breeze made it perfect
customer_reviews.author: Wellread

customer_reviews.title: Kept us cool. Sturdy against wind
customer_reviews.text: Allowed me and my pregnant friend to nap at the beach and stay protected from the sun. Fold down flaps allowed us to easily change out of our wet clothes when we were ready to go. Loved the shade and privacy!!
customer_reviews.author: Rae C

customer_reviews.title: Practice before bring it out
customer_reviews.text: Nice color and durable materials, however, recommend to use it and get it right at home before bring it to breach if there’s your destination.
customer_reviews.author: Nora Yau

customer_reviews.title: Great buy! Well worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Love the room this tent has. Very well constructed. I dislike the small stakes. Some don’t hold in medium winds. I just found larger stakes.
customer_reviews.author: Khristian M.

customer_reviews.title: I like how big the tent is and was very easy ...
customer_reviews.text: I like how big the tent is and was very easy to set up and take down only problem is gets very hot couldnt stand sitting in it too long bought to be able to sit w baby and breastfeed son but ended up doing it out of tent. Should have opening in the top or vent to let hot air out, heat just raises to top on a hot beach day..and makes it unbearable to sit in! Wish could return for diff. One
customer_reviews.author: Colleen C

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tent, perfect coverage for kiddos and easy to
customer_reviews.text: Excellent tent, perfect coverage for kiddos and easy to transport
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for beach,,, two people fit with room to spare... setup a breeze... take down easy when you figure it out.
customer_reviews.author: Lord Reesespieces

customer_reviews.title: Love this tent and the color is beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this beach tent. It’s quick and easy to set up and take down. I recommend practicing at home first and then opening it on the beach. We got a mini monsoon at the beach and the tent helped a lot to keep the pelting rain at bay, and didn’t break even though it became crazy windy. Would purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect pop up tent for a family of 4; light and very easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Easy to open and close
customer_reviews.text: Very spacious and easy to transport. When done, we fold and put under the bed. Really good material
customer_reviews.author: lorena

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to set up. Can even set up tent in livingroom for sleepovers too.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine E. Hall

customer_reviews.title: Well made product/ easy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put up . Kids loved it on the beach Great cover from the sun.
customer_reviews.author: Regina Hoggle

customer_reviews.title: Excellent design and high quality construction
customer_reviews.text: Excellent design and high quality construction,very easy pop up and super light weight .So exciting an upcoming long weekend trip to Long branch !
customer_reviews.author: hester

customer_reviews.title: Very easy set up
customer_reviews.text: It was bigger than I thought,but so nice and easy to use... it can easily fit a family of 4, or 3-4 adults comfortably
customer_reviews.author: Randi J.

customer_reviews.title: More complicated to open than you can imagine
customer_reviews.text: It serves it's purpose. Far from being easy to open or out away . If you are looking for quick reliable set up this is Not It.
customer_reviews.author: marley landes

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for escaping the sun at the beach. We had to use the stakes as it was a very windy day but hubby was able to set it up and tear down with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Opens just as they say... now...how do I get it to close back up?
customer_reviews.text: They need to create a Youtube video showing how to close it back up.
customer_reviews.author: Barry VonHagel

customer_reviews.title: broken when we opened it
customer_reviews.text: One of the tent poles was either broken or broke when we opened it for the first time. Very disappointing. Product is very fragile.
customer_reviews.author: Lee J. Brenner

customer_reviews.title: Pop Up Beach Cabana
customer_reviews.text: I really nice sized, easy to set up beach tent. It takes some getting used to for packing. Easy to carry and light weight.
customer_reviews.author: amy l ayres

customer_reviews.title: Best Beach Accessory!!!
customer_reviews.text: This tent is so easy!!! pops right up. I folded it up by myself, takes a little work, but definitely doable with one person. Totally recommend this beach tent. We will even use it to sleep in when we go camping!
customer_reviews.author: shenoa stephens

customer_reviews.title: great tent!
customer_reviews.text: Been using this tent for two+ years and it is still great. Up and down easy and lightweight. Only improvement would be a better zipper on the carry bag, it rusted and snapped early on but the bag still holds the tent so not a big deal. For the $$$ its a GREAT buy!!
customer_reviews.author: chris scillieri

customer_reviews.title: Watch the video on how to close it
customer_reviews.text: We had to watch the video to learn how to close it. After that it was pretty simple.
customer_reviews.author: Maritza Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Love the beach tent
customer_reviews.text: Love the beach tent. Bought it to take to softball games so my little one would have a place to play out of the sun while her older sister played softball. Now that it’s summer we will try it out in the Beach. I personally think it is very easy to open and close back up with only one person.
customer_reviews.author: Emily W.

customer_reviews.title: In love! Easy to assemble and to put it away
customer_reviews.text: In love ! Easy to assemble and to put it away.
customer_reviews.author: MCR

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Roomy enough for 2 beach chairs & ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Roomy enough for 2 beach chairs & a small table.
customer_reviews.author: Socalgal

customer_reviews.title: GREAT
customer_reviews.text: THE PERSON WHO WANTED IT SAID IT WAS GOOD FOR THE BEACH
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item for my beach trip. Unfortunately the only good thing I can say is it is lightweight and it provides shade. Downside is it blocks any air to come through and is not easy to put up/away.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Set up and take down is super easy and fast
customer_reviews.text: Set up and take down is super easy and fast! Perfect size. Comes with an easy to carry bag. Highly recommend for the beach!
customer_reviews.author: andi masters

customer_reviews.title: Would like one side of the tent like the back to ...
customer_reviews.text: Would like one side of the tent like the back to close more tightly like on a zipper, instead it has clips...so you have holes.. Love the size and easy to fold and unfold
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Love this!! Has enough insulation to keep the sun out and the fresh air blowing inside. Light, very easy to fold up.
customer_reviews.author: stefy

customer_reviews.title: It’s a no from me
customer_reviews.text: So if you are buying this for the beach 🙄 DONT ! It is a waste of money especially if it’s a windy day. . . . Save your money
customer_reviews.author: Ashanti harris

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and take down
customer_reviews.text: I was at the Beach 12 hours and no sun burn. Easy to set up and take down. It fit two people and four dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We liked this tent
customer_reviews.text: We liked this tent. If it's a windy day at the beach though be prepared to fight putting it up, you might be better to opt for no tent or just use an umbrella. It was big for me, my husband and two kids, we could all relax in it.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: At 27 Inches in Diameter, it is too large to go on a plane easily.
customer_reviews.text: We like the tent, but at 27 inches in diameter when folded, it is too large for us to take on a plane on our beach vacation. The description does not mention the size of the folded tent, although we discovered after receiving the tent that the dimension does appear on one of the views, Had we noticed the size of the folded unit before the purchase, we would have gotten the smaller tent. We will keep it, but for local use.
customer_reviews.author: Ohio Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loved it! Worked great
customer_reviews.text: Bought this item for a family beach trip. Loved it! Worked great, easy to put up and take down. We didn't have any windy days at the beach but I feel confident it would have been sturdy enough to handle it.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Wilkins

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the beach
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the beach. It's light, breathable and doesn't fly away. The little one loves it. Glad I bought it!!
customer_reviews.author: Gwendolyn O

customer_reviews.title: Roomy enough, easy up, easy down.
customer_reviews.text: Used it once and found it roomy enough for two adults and two children.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Easy!
customer_reviews.text: We've had this for a year now (2 summers) and still Love the ease at which it snaps open and folds close. Still in tact.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Cardio

customer_reviews.title: Did not come with the sand bags like it said it would
customer_reviews.text: The tent is ok. Did not come with the sand bags like it said it would. The doors do not stay all the way up. Other than that it’s a good tent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! Plenty of room
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! Plenty of room, easy set up, and the pockets to put sand in on the sides to hold it down are such a great idea!
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Worth the effort
customer_reviews.text: Took some practice to collapse the tent after use, but is easy to do now. Great for the beach.
customer_reviews.author: Elvira Uresti-Regan

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: USED IT ONCE AND ONE OF THE FLEXIBLE RODS BROKE
customer_reviews.author: LROD

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up. Worked great even on a windy beach front. LOVE our pop up tent.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Jo Little

customer_reviews.title: Love the tent
customer_reviews.text: Love the tent, but disappointed that we couldn't use it at the beach visited because the height was too tall. The rules of the S.Carolina beach resort we stayed at stipulated no tents over 36 inches... so we didn't get to use it:(
customer_reviews.author: MickJ

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Broken, I just threw it out instead of dealing with the shipping
customer_reviews.author: Robert Vitale

product_meta.title: G4Free Large Pop Up Beach Tent 3-4 Person Sun Shelter Portable Automatic Cabana UPF 50+ Anti UV Sun Shade
feature_bullets: We recommend WATCHING YouTube videos and PRACTICING popping it up and down before you go out with it.

【Spacious and Comfortable】The size of the large pop up tent is: 86.6 X 74.8 X 51.18 inch. Much Bigger than competitors' (other competitors' size is only 43.3 X 47.2 inch). You can put 2-3 sleep bags inside the tent for your kids or family. This beach tent provide a spacious space for 2-4 persons, comfortable and great tent for family outdoor activities.

【Excellent Ventilation】With two large doors and two side mesh windows, the sun shelter maintain a great ventilation effect inside, keeping the fresh air circulating. Besides, you can scroll down the doors, preventing the insects, mosquitoes and the sun's harmful rays when sleeping inside the pop up beach tent. Rolling up for ventilation, down for privacy protection. Two storage pockets for your beach accessories, keeping your stuff from the dirt and sands.

【Durable Material & UV Protection】Made of 190T silver coating waterproof sunscreen polyester, the instant tent block most of the UV rays, enable you to enjoy the breeze when camping at the beach with kids and family without worrying about the sunshine. The sun shade tent is not only durable and Anti UV but also super lightweight at only 4.25 pounds and easily carried to anywhere you want, comes in a convenient handled carrying bag.

【Wind Resistant】This sun shelter comes with 4 extra sandbags, 4 built-in sandbags, 4 wind ropes and 8 tent pegs, which ensure the strong anti wind capacity. Enough sandbags filling with rocks and sands keep the cabana tent steady in the wind. Made of fiberglass frame, solid and safety, making the beach tent stably stand by itself and keep shape after long time use.

【Widely Use & Guarantee】Sun protective, ventilated, windproof and lightweight, the pop up shade tent is a great choice for beach, park, lake, camping, fishing, sporting event or just relaxing in the backyard. If you meet any quality issue about our tent, please contact us and we will give positive solutions within 24 hours, your satisfaction is our target.
